evidence.claim: Total Primary Care uses AWS services for its infrastructure.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations for handling health data.
Total Primary Care integrates with EHR systems using FHIR standards.
X12 transactions are part of the billing and claims processing systems.
Total Primary Care utilizes REST APIs for third-party integrations.

icp.icp_reason: Offers X12 EDI transactions and focused on API integration for healthcare.
